data.title: Public Broadcast Laboratory; 116
data.meta_description:
This episode of PBL has segments including "Civil Disorder", about the
civil rights movement; "Bedford Stuyvesant: Progress?", which discusses
segregation; "Literary Review by James Baldwin"; and "Gordon Parks' Diary of
a Harlem Family", which uses photographer Gordon Parks' photo journal of
time spent with a family to discuss poverty and race.
data.text: Welcome to the American Archive of Public Broadcasting Online Reading Room (ORR). To access media in the ORR, please review and agree to the ORR Rules of Use.
